trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were 2 other sightings in Redding on or around August 11th 2010
divs: sighting detailsat 8:23pm i was outside and way up and to the west is where i saw it. the sky was still very well lit since it was early evening and i thought i heard jet noise so i looked up and didn't see it at first. then the object appeared out of nowhere so i thought, "oh, there's the jet". as it turned out the noise i heard stopped and was coming from a different direction anyway. i observed the cylindrical\rectangular craft as it moved faster than what a jet would but steadily. i saw colored lights along the sides for the first time i believe which is also why i thought it was a plane at first but the lights did not pulsate or strobe. it moved northward, did it's "flash of bright light thing" dimmed out and disappeared from sight. it's just what they do.
Summary: Cylindrical craft and fireball across the sky in Norhtern California.
